sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
happens
, se zgodi ali je storjeno, ne da bi bilo načrtovano.

seg.quote: The explosion had happened at one in the morning.
...a court of inquiry into what happened.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
happens to someone
, se zgodi in vpliva na nekoga.

seg.quote: ...all the ghastly things that had happened to him.

sense.def:
To happen to do something
pomeni nekaj storiti po naključju.

seg.quote: He happened to be at their base when the alert began.

sense.def:
Izraz
as it happens
uporabimo pred trditvijo, da bi napovedali novo dejstvo.

seg.quote: As it happens, I brought the note with me.
